attributes.action: Back the British Pound with gold and / or silver.
attributes.additional_details:
Web. www.hiddensecretsofmoney.com
Web. www.sprott.com
Book. When Money Dies. Adam Ferguson.
Book. The Silver Manifesto. David Morgan.
Book. The Big Reset. Willem Middelkoop
Organisation. GATA (Gold Anti Trust Action Committee)
attributes.background:
Many people are alarmed at the voracious rate of money printing or QE here in the UK (& elsewhere). This is nothing more than a ponzi scheme & this one will end in disaster soon.
We need to get ahead of the game & back our currency with gold/silver before others steal the lead on this.
